question: India and this country signs an agreement of legal framework for sharing of information and intelligence between the Customs authorities.
explanation: India and Tajikistan signing an Agreement to provide a legal framework for sharing of information and intelligence between the Customs authorities of the two countries and help in the proper application of Customs law. It was approved by the Union Cabinet chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi. It also gave its approval for the Multilateral Convention to Implement Tax Treaty Related Measures to Prevent Base Erosion and Profit Shifting.
